desc: Welcome to A Touch of Satin. Here you will find luxurious pillowcases for your perfect night's sleep, eye pillows for yoga and aromatherapy relaxation, therapy wraps for soothing natural healing, travel pillows and accent pillows in every color for every room, face masks in satin or cotton and stethoscope covers.

layout.text: Welcome to A Touch of Satin
A Touch of Satin pillowcases for the perfect night's sleep, eye pillows to unwind, therapy wraps for natural healing, sleep masks to put life to sleep, travel/accent pillows for comfort and style!!!
